name: 100 triples
description:
Three shapes and three colors to choose! One big main shape on the center of screen which is a pattern to select a figure from the bottom randomized shapes.
Choose correct!

100 levels means 100 challenges and more fun for you.

But! There is a three difficulty levels! So, hundred levels expands to 300 new choices.

Each score you can save in your Game Center account and then you can check your position in global ranking. Log in and try.

Have fun!
